content: ltc = learn to crochet this scarf is great for teaching the basics of crochet it s simple enough that you can make it as long as you want by making your beginning chain longer as long as it s divisible by 3 you can also make it as wide as you like by repeating the row until it s what you like then you add the edging and viola you re done you can use any yarn that catches your eye too this is a great project
